title: MASTERCOOL 62010 Gray/Yellow 30 lb Refrigerant Recovery Tank Without Float Switch and ¼” FL-M (7/16-20)
features: 30 LB DOT TANK with a Y valve for liquid and vapor.Fit Type: Universal
REUSABLE and is AUS and Transport Canada (TC) approved and conforms to DOT-4BA400 specs and ARI guidelines
UNPRESSURIZED AND SHIPPED EMPTY with dry air
COMPATIBLE WITH ALL REFRIGERANTS (CFC’s, HFC’s, HCFC’s and blends)
description: • Powder coated cylinder for high gloss, durable finish.  • Y-valve for liquid and vapor  • 3/4” NPT opening accepts 80% fill float switch shut-off device  • 1/4” opening for air purge valve  • Collar design for ease of handling  • Reusable and conforms to DOT-4BA400 specifications and ARI guidelines  • Pre-charged cylinder provides a clean, dry interior  • Storage and transport of recovered refrigerant gases  • Valve & float switch UL listed  • AUS approved and TC approved  • Inclusive of R410a and other high pressure refrigerants  • NOT FOR USE WITH NITROGEN  • All cylinders are pressure and leak tested directly at factory headquarters

• Size (w x h): 9.125"" x 17.52"  • Tare Weight: 17.99 lb.  • Standard Specification: DOT-4BA400  • Nominal Water Capacity: 26.2 lb. / 11.9 L  • Service Pressure: 400 PSI / 2.7 MPa  • Tank Test Pressure: 800 PSI / 5.5 MPa  • Relief Valve Pressure: 600 PSI / 4.1 MPa  • Air Tightness Pressure: 400 PSI / 2.7 MPa  • Body Material: HP295
